name: Popover
purpose: Present interactive, contextual content anchored to a trigger.
useWhen: User needs to interact with controls or inputs
Context should be preserved without navigation
rules: Content may be arbitrary and interactive
User may perform multiple actions before closing
Popover is anchored to a trigger element
doNotUseWhen: Presenting a list of actions (use DropdownMenu)
Critical confirmation or irreversible actions (use Modal)
aiHints: Use Popover when the user must interact, not just choose
Popover is not a menu replacement
